Transcription for 548064

Inaudible
Why do smoke
Trau ilu halayah, my first blood of laws,
Onda nau my gula in sin and loss.
Trau ilu halayah, my spirit of revenue,
And shall be no more the earth and the earth.
Trau halayah, my spirit of revenue,
Onda nau my gula in sin and loss.
Trau ilu halayah, my spirit of revenue,
Onda nau my gula in sin and loss.
Trau halayah, my spirit of revenue,
And I will feed for the divider food.
Trau halayah, my gula in sin,
Onda nau my gula in sin,
Trau grosat weh nai ko nai at nais,
Onda nai nau sin, nai shun, nai lai.
Trau grosat weh nai ko nai at nais,
Onda nau my gula in sin, nai lai at nais,
Onda nau my gula in sin, nai lai.
Trau grosat weh nai ko nai at nais,
Onda nau my gula in sin, nai lai.
Trau grosat weh nai ko nai at nais,
Onda nau my gula in sin, nai lai at nais.
